short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a QR code from the current tab's URL so you can open that link on a smartphone.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Continue watching, reading or browsing on the go!
This extension creates a QR code with the URL of the active tab so you can look at it with a smart phone's camera and open the same page quickly on your phone's browser.
